# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've prioritized authentic connections while playing strategically. I've been transparent about my alliances and decisions, even when difficult. 

My approach has balanced relationship-building with necessary game moves. I've shown loyalty where possible while making tough choices when required.

P1 has played well, but I believe my balanced approach of honesty and strategy deserves your consideration. I've tried to maintain integrity while navigating the complexities of this game.

I respect whatever decision you make and appreciate the opportunity to have played alongside all of you.

My journey here reflects my commitment to the game and respect for all of you. I ask for your vote to stay because I’ve earned this moment through consistency and integrity. Let’s make this a victory built on merit. Thank you."
